channel.title: Escape From Abject Reality
channel.description: ((Based on object shows on YouTube, specifically BFDI and Inanimate Insanity.)) 12 objects are kidnapped to take part in a dangerous â€˜reality show'. They have to constantly avoid lethal obstacles that the sadistic host, Snake Oil had in store for them. Meanwhile, secrets lurk at every corner, and could be the key to their way out.
